name: Paracetamol 650 mg
description: Paracetamol helps reduce fever and relieve mild to moderate pain.
directions: Adults: 1 tablet every 6-8 hours as needed. Do not exceed 4 g/day.

name: Azithromycin 500 mg
description: Macrolide antibiotic effective against many bacterial infections.
directions: As prescribed by your physician only.

name: Vitamin C 1000 mg
description: High-potency Vitamin C to support immunity and antioxidant defense.
directions: Take 1 tablet daily after a meal.
safety: Consult a doctor if pregnant or nursing.

name: Automatic BP Monitor
description: Digital blood pressure monitor with cuff.
safety: Not a substitute for clinical diagnosis.
